config.question: Which of the following led to the demise of the much-hated Andros regime?

answer_3.response: Consider This: Andros was the first royal governor put in charge of the Dominion of New England. He was eventually jailed for his harsh rule in New England. See L.O. 3.5 How did colonial revolts affect the political culture of Virginia and New England?
